name: phonebook-backend
description: This repository consists of the code of Part 3 from Full Stack Open course on https://fullstackopen.com

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../fullstack-open/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../fullstack-open-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Nazmul Hasan Shajib
